file.name: wasabee-server-api.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 0.2.1
  title: Wasabee Server
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: https://am.wasabee.rocks/
  - url: https://ap.wasabee.rocks/
  - url: https://eu.wasabee.rocks/
paths:
  /aptok:
    post:
      summary: Auth with google auth token
      tags:
        - Auth
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                accessToken:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /oneTimeToken:
    post:
      summary: Auth with OTP
      tags:
        - Auth
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                token:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/me/logout:
    get:
      summary: Logout
      tags:
        - Auth
      responses:
        "200":
          description: operation uploaded

  /me:
    get:
      deprecated: true
      tags:
        - User Info
      responses:
        "200":
          description: User data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AgentData"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/me:
    get:
      tags:
        - User Info
      responses:
        "200":
          description: User data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AgentData"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/me/intelid:
    put:
      tags:
        - User Info
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - name
                - qt
                - faction
              properties:
                name:
                  description: the name to store
                  type: string
                qt:
                  description: the querytoken from the /me data
                  type: string
                faction:
                  description: ENLIGHTENED or RESISTANCE
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: data stored
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/me/commproof:
    get:
      tags:
        - User Info
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: JWT for Community verification
          content:
            application/jwt:
              schema:
                type: string
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/me/commverify:
    get:
      tags:
        - User Info
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: verification success
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      tags:
        - User Info
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Community identity removed
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"


  /api/v1/me/{teamID}:
    delete:
      tags:
        - User Info
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw:
    post:
      summary: Upload operation
      tags:
        - Operation
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Operation"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: operation uploaded
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/AgentData"
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}:
    get:
      summary: Get operation
      tags:
        - Operation
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Server operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Operation"
        "304":
          description: Not modified
        "410":
          description: Operation has been deleted
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    put:
      summary: Update operation
      tags:
        - Operation
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Operation"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: operation updated
        '401':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Delete operation
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      tags:
        - Operation
      responses:
        "200":
          description: operation deleted
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/info:
    post:
      summary: Set operation's comment
      tags:
        - Operation
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - info
              properties:
                info:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/marker/{markerID}/assign:
    post:
      summary: Assign marker
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Assignment
        - Marker
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/markerIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - agent
              properties:
                agent:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/marker/{markerID}/{action}:
    get:
      summary: Set marker state
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Assignment
        - Marker
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/markerIDParam"
        - name: action
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [incomplete, complete]
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/marker/{markerID}/comment:
    post:
      summary: Set marker comment
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Marker
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/markerIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - comment
              properties:
                comment:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/link/{linkID}/swap:
    get:
      summary: Reverse link
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Link
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/linkIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/link/{linkID}/assign:
    post:
      summary: Assign link
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Assignment
        - Link
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/linkIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - agent
              properties:
                agent:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/link/{linkID}/{action}:
    get:
      summary: Set link state
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Assignment
        - Link
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/linkIDParam"
        - name: action
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [incomplete, complete]
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/link/{linkID}/desc:
    post:
      summary: Set lin description
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Link
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/linkIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - desc
              properties:
                desc:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/link/{linkID}/zone:
    post:
      summary: Set link zone
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Link
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/linkIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - zone
              properties:
                zone:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Zone"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/task/{taskID}:
    get:
      summary: Get task
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: Task data
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Task"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/task/{taskID}/{action}:
    put:
      summary: Change the state of the Task
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
        - name: action
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            enum: [complete, incomplete, acknowledge, reject, claim]
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/task/{taskID}/order:
    put:
      summary: Set task order
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - order
              properties:
                order:
                  type: number
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/task/{taskID}/assign:
    put:
      summary: Set task assignments
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - agent
              properties:
                agent:
                  type: array
                  items:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
            encoding:
              agent:
                explode: true
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Delete task assignments
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/task/{taskID}/depend/{deptaskID}:
    put:
      summary: Add a task dependency
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/deptaskIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Delete a task dependency
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Task
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/taskIDParam"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/deptaskIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/portal/{portalID}/keyonhand:
    post:
      summary: Define key on hand for a portal
      tags:
        - Operation
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
        - name: portalID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Portal ID
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - count
                - capsule
              properties:
                count:
                  type: integer
                capsule:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/draw/{opID}/perms:
    post:
      summary: Add permission
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Permission
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - team
                - role
              properties:
                team:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
                role:
                  type: string
                  enum: [write, read, assignonly]
                zone:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Zone"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Delete permission
      tags:
        - Operation
        - Permission
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/opIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - team
                - role
              properties:
                team:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
                role:
                  type: string
                  enum: [write, read, assignonly]
                zone:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Zone"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/agent/{gid}:
    get:
      summary: Get Agent
      tags:
        - Agent
      parameters:
        - name: gid
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Google ID of the agent
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: requested agent
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Agent"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/agent/{agentID}/target:
    post:
      summary: Send a terget to an agent
      tags:
        - Agent
      parameters:
        - name: agentID
          in: path
          required: true
          description: Agent ID
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - Name
                - Lat
                - Lng
                - ID
                - Type
              properties:
                Name:
                  type: string
                Lat:
                  type: string
                Lng:
                  type: string
                ID:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
                Type:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

  /api/v1/team/new:
    get:
      summary: Create a team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - name: name
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success??
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}:
    get:
      summary: Fetch a team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: requested team
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamData"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Delete a team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/chown:
    get:
      summary: Change team's owner
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: newOwner
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/rename:
    put:
      summary: Rename a team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - teamname
              properties:
                teamname:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/announce:
    post:
      summary: Send an announce to team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - m
              properties:
                m:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/rocks:
    get:
      summary: Pull rocks
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/genJoinKey:
    get:
      summary: Request join link
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: joinlink ???
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/delJoinKey:
    get:
      summary: Delete current join link
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/:
    get:
      summary: Link team to a rock community
      tags:
        - Team
        - Rocks
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: community
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
        - name: apikey
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          description: success
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        "403":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Forbidden"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/{agentID}:
    post:
      summary: Add agent to team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: agentID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
    delete:
      summary: Remove agent from team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: agentID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/{agentID}/displayname:
    post:
      summary: Set agent display name in the team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: agentID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - displayname
              properties:
                displayname:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"
  /api/v1/team/{teamID}/{agentID}/squad:
    post:
      summary: Set agent squad in the team
      tags:
        - Team
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/teamIDParam"
        - name: agentID
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
      requestBody:
        content:
          multipart/form-data:
            schema:
              type: object
              required:
                - squad
              properties:
                squad:
                  type: string
      responses:
        "200":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/PostSuccess"
        "401":
          $ref: "#/components/responses/NotLoggedIn"
        '406':
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unacceptable"
        default:
          $ref: "#/components/responses/Unexpected"

components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
      bearerFormat: JWT
  responses:
    PostSuccess:
      description: Success
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            type: object
            properties:
              updateID:
                type: string

    NotLoggedIn:
      description: The user is not logged
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    Forbidden:
      description: Forbidden
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    Unacceptable:
      description: Invalid Input
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    Unexpected:
      description: unexpected error
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

  schemas:
    EnlID:
      type: string
    GoogleID:
      type: string
    TaskID:
      type: string
      minLength: 40
      maxLength: 40
    MarkerType:
      type: string
    OperationID:
      type: string
      minLength: 40
      maxLength: 40
    PortalID:
      type: string
      minLength: 35
      maxLength: 40
    TeamID:
      type: string
    Zone:
      type: integer
    AgentData:
      type: object
      required:
        - GoogleID
        - IngressName
        - Level
        - LocationKey
        - VVerified
        - VBlacklisted
        - Vid
        - RocksVerified
        - RAID
        - RISC
        - ProfileImage
        - OwnedTeams
        - Teams
        - Ops
        - Telegram
      properties:
        GoogleID:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
        IngressName:
          type: string
        Level:
          type: integer
        LocationKey:
          type: string
        VVerified:
          type: boolean
        VBlacklisted:
          type: boolean
        Vid:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/EnlID"
        RocksVerified:
          type: boolean
        RAID:
          type: boolean
        RISC:
          type: boolean
        ProfileImage:
          type: string
        OwnedTeams:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdTeam"
        Teams:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdTeam"
        Ops:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/AdOperation"

    AdTeam:
      type: object
      required:
        - ID
        - Name
        - Owner
        - RocksComm
        - RocksKey
        - JoinLinkToken
        - State
        - ShareWD
        - LoadWD
      properties:
        ID:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
        Name:
          type: string
        RocksComm:
          type: string
        RocksKey:
          type: string
        JoinLinkToken:
          type: string
        State:
          type: string
        ShareWD:
          type: string
        LoadWD:
          type: string
        Owner:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"

    AdOperation:
      type: object
      properties:
        ID:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationID"
        Name:
          type: string
        IsOwner:
          type: boolean
        Color:
          type: string
        TeamID:
          type: string

    Agent:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
        - level
        - enlid
        - pic
        - Vverified
        - blacklisted
        - rocks
        - squad
        - state
        - lat
        - lng
        - date
        - shareWD
        - loadWD
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
        name:
          type: string
        vname:
          type: string
        rocksname:
          type: string
        intelname:
          type: string
        intelfaction:
          type: string
        level:
          type: integer
        enlid:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/EnlID"
        pic:
          type: string
        Vverified:
          type: boolean
        blacklisted:
          type: boolean
        rocks:
          type: boolean
        squad:
          type: string
        state:
          type: boolean
        lat:
          type: number
        lng:
          type: number
        date:
          type: string
        shareWD:
          type: boolean
        loadWD:
          type: boolean
        distance:
          type: number
    TeamData:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - id
        - agents
        - rc
        - jlt
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        id:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
        agents:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Agent"
        rc:
          type: string
        jlt:
          type: string

    Operation:
      type: object
      required:
        - ID
        - name
        - creator
        - opportals
        - links
        - blockers
        - markers
        - teamlist
        - modified
        - comment
        - keysonhand
        - fetched
        - zones
      properties:
        ID:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
        name:
          type: string
        creator:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
        opportals:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Portal"
        links:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Link"
        blockers:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Link"
        markers:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Marker"
        teamlist:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/OpPermission"
        modified:
          type: string
        comment:
          type: string
        keysonhand:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/KeyOnHand"
        fetched:
          type: string
        zones:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/ZoneListElement"
    Portal:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
        name:
          type: string
        lat:
          type: string
        lng:
          type: string
        comment:
          type: string
        hardness:
          type: string
    Task:
      type: object
      properties:
        task:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
        comment:
          type: string
        state:
          type: string
        order:
          type: integer
        zone:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Zone"
        assignments:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
        dependsOn:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
        deltaminutes:
          type: number
    Link:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Task"
        - type: object
          properties:
            ID:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
            assignedTo:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
            fromPortalId:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
            toPortalId:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
            description:
              type: string
              description: deprecated for "comment"
            throwOrderPos:
              type: integer
              description: deprecated for "order"
            completed:
              type: boolean
            color:
              type: string
    Marker:
      allOf:
        - $ref: "#/components/schemas/Task"
        - type: object
          properties:
            ID:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
            assignedTo:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
            portalId:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
            type:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/MarkerType"
            completedBy:
              type: string
            completedID:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
    OpPermission:
      type: object
      properties:
        opid:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationID"
        teamid:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationID"
        role:
          type: string
        zone:
          type: integer
    ZoneListElement:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/Zone"
        name:
          type: string
    KeyOnHand:
      type: object
      properties:
        portalId:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/PortalID"
        gid:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/GoogleID"
        onhand:
          type: integer
        capsule:
          type: string
    Error:
      type: object
      required:
        - code
        - message
      properties:
        code:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        message:
          type: string

  parameters:
    teamIDParam:
      name: teamID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the team
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TeamID"
    opIDParam:
      name: opID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the Operation
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/OperationID"
    taskIDParam:
      name: taskID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the task
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
    deptaskIDParam:
      name: deptaskID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the task
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
    markerIDParam:
      name: markerID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the marker
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"
    linkIDParam:
      name: linkID
      in: path
      required: true
      description: ID of the link
      schema:
        $ref: "#/components/schemas/TaskID"

security:
  - bearerAuth: []

Error: buildIR: make ir: anonymous type name conflict: "APIV1TeamTeamIDGetRes"
